title: Conduct Mandatory Compliance Training
description: HR needs to ensure all employees complete their annual mandatory 'Anti-Harassment' training.

tasks.description: Assign the 'Anti-Harassment' training module to all active employees in the LMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: L&D specialist successfully assigns the training.

tasks.description: Send communications to all employees about the requirement and the deadline for completion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist sends announcement and reminder emails.

tasks.description: Run a completion report from the LMS and follow up with employees who are not yet compliant.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist generates a report and sends individual reminders to delinquent employees.
